tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Altar with Tabernacle and Two Priests in Conversation", 1750–75.
1750–75. Pen and brown ink, gray wash, graphite, ruled borders in pen and brown on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1472.
